name: polyesters of 1,2-propanediol and/or 1,3- and/or 1,4-butanediol and/or polypropyleneglycol with adipic acid, which may be end-capped with acetic acid or fatty acids C12-C18 or n-octanol and/or n-decanol
SMLTrestrictions: G31 Group Restriction No. 31 corresponds to FCM substance No. 73,797. Group restriction specification is expressed as the sum of the substances.
ExpressedAs: As the sum of the substances
